aka: My Senses Are All I Have to Offer

cast.name: 阿尔巴诺·杰罗尼莫 Albano Jerónimo

awards:
第77届戛纳电影节(2024)

this_title: As minhas sensações são tudo o que tenho para oferecer
trans_title: 我的感官是我所能提供的一切
My Senses Are All I Have to Offer
introduction: Lourdes and Lana met telepathically using “sensory pills”, a technology that allows access to other people’s sensations from a distance. After months of relationship, Lourdes decides to visit the country house of her parents, Vicente and Carl, and introduce them to her girlfriend.
chinese_title: 我的感官是我所能提供的一切
foreign_title: As minhas sensações são tudo o que tenho para oferecer
